#Database Design Decisions 

=Database Design=

Information about the database, currently hosted on playground.
database name: BeadLoomGame

SQL Table Query: 
CREATE TABLE  `BeadLoomGame`.`HighScores` (
`user` VARCHAR( 20 ) NOT NULL ,
`score` INT NOT NULL ,
`time` VARCHAR( 10 ) NOT NULL ,
`Medal` VARCHAR( 20 ) NOT NULL ,
`Puzzle` VARCHAR( 20 ) NOT NULL ,
`timeStamp` TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

SQL Insert Query: 
INSERT INTO  `BeadLoomGame`.`HighScores` (
`user` ,
`score` ,
`time` ,
`medal` ,
`puzzle` ,
`timeStamp`
)
